name: Gunfight
overview: A simple BASIC 2-player only type-in clone of the early arcade game Boot Hill for the Commodore VIC-20. This was developed by Neil Thacker and published in the June 1984 issue of Commodore Horizons Magazine. Controls: Player 1: A (left), D (right), W (up), X (down), S (fire). Player 2: L (left), ; (right), P (up), . (down), : (fire).
